bibl.title: A Late Antique Engraved Plaque from Egypt.
bibl.note: Plaque du Musée Métropolitain, de style classique, à placer au VIe siècle ap. J.-C., en Égypte. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 21 (1950) p. 203.

bibl.title: Marsyas (A Publication by the Students of the Institute of Fine Arts, New York University)

bibl.seg: Brown Donald F., A Late Antique Engraved Plaque from Egypt.
Marsyas (A Publication by the Students of the Institute of Fine Arts, New York University) 1 (1941) pp. 17-26.
Plaque du Musée Métropolitain, de style classique, à placer au VIe siècle ap. J.-C., en Égypte. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 21 (1950) p. 203.
